titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: GENERAL MEDICAL PRACTICE CODE (PATIENT REGISTRATION (MOTHER)) - Description

div.p: GENERAL MEDICAL PRACTICE CODE (PATIENT REGISTRATION (MOTHER)) is the same as the data element GENERAL MEDICAL PRACTICE CODE (PATIENT REGISTRATION) Â for the mother.
The data for GENERAL MEDICAL PRACTICE CODE (PATIENT REGISTRATION) is supplied by the NHS Prescription Services.
